HJiaCwCEI.description: Rotation value. Sets the rotation angle. Lies in the range [0, 3] where: 0 is 0° vertical position; 1 is 90° horizontal position; 2 is 180° vertical position; 3 is 270° horizontal position.
HJiaCwCEI.label: R

rJMG60wC4U.description: Pulses when the screen rotation is done.
rJMG60wC4U.label: DONE

@/rotate.description: Rotates the screen of the display to one of four positions: 0° vertical, 90° horizontal, 180° vertical, and 270° horizontal.

@/st7735-device.description:
The main device node for the ST7735 displays.

Physically, some displays based on the 7735 chip may differ from each other and have different sets of instructions for initialization. To solve this, the ST7735  node should proceed with an inialize node of a specific type.

description: Nodes to drive ST7735 based TFT LCD displays. This library supports 128x160 resolution displays which are connected through the hardware SPI interface. Physically, some displays based on the 7735 chip may differ from each other and have different sets of instructions for initialization. To solve this, the library contains several device nodes for different types of displays. These nodes are labeled "B", "G", "RG", and "RR".
name: st7735-display
